ygData.subject: Re: (no subject)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... They really don t tell you I think, but you need 2 small pieces of ore. And don t stack them whatever you do. 1 ore in one slot, 1 ore in another slot, and
ygData.messageBody:
>I was trying to make metal bits today, i used 1 water and 1 small ore
>piece, nothing happened. Can someone tell me why? The message said that
>the quatities were in correct and that the things didnt combine


They really don't tell you I think, but you need 2 small pieces of ore. And don't stack them whatever you do. 1 ore in one slot, 1 ore in another slot, and 1 water flask in another spot. Good luck

Grimmlokk the happy warrior of E'ci.
